SELECT PDL_NO as RQST_NO , RQST_DT , ANIM_BUTLER , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-01'), 0) AS SAMPLE1 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-02'), 0) AS SAMPLE2 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-3'), 0) AS SAMPLE3 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-4'), 0) AS SAMPLE4 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-5'), 0) AS SAMPLE5 /*, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-6'), 0) AS SAMPLE6*/ , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO), 0) AS TOTAL , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = A.ANIM_THIRD_CD) AS ANIM_NM , ANIM_BIRTH , IFNULL(ANIM_CNT, 1) AS ANIM_CNT , HOSP_NM , DOC_NM FROM TB_RCEPT A WHERE 1=1
AND RQST_DT >= replace(replace(#{stDt},'-',''),'-','')
AND RQST_DT <= replace(replace(#{endDt},'-',''),'-','')

SELECT B.RQST_DT , SUM(B.SAMPLE1) AS SAMPLE1 , SUM(B.SAMPLE2) AS SAMPLE2 , SUM(B.SAMPLE3) AS SAMPLE3 , SUM(B.SAMPLE4) AS SAMPLE4 , SUM(B.SAMPLE5) AS SAMPLE5 , SUM(B.TOTAL) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(SUBSTR(RQST_DT,1,7),'.','-') AS RQST_DT , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-01'), 0) AS SAMPLE1 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-02'), 0) AS SAMPLE2 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-3'), 0) AS SAMPLE3 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-4'), 0) AS SAMPLE4 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND SAMPLE_CODE = 'A002-5'), 0) AS SAMPLE5 , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SAMPLE WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO), 0) AS TOTAL FROM TB_RCEPT A WHERE 1=1
AND RQST_DT LIKE CONCAT(#{stDt}, '%')
AND RQST_DT LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y'), '%')
UNION SELECT '2022-01', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-02', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-03', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-04', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-05', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-06', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL ) B GROUP BY RQST_DT ORDER BY RQST_DT

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.RQST_DT , SUM(A.SAMPLE1) AS SAMPLE1 , SUM(A.SAMPLE2) AS SAMPLE2 , SUM(A.SAMPLE3) AS SAMPLE3 , SUM(A.SAMPLE4) AS SAMPLE4 , SUM(A.SAMPLE5) AS SAMPLE5 , SUM(A.SAMPLE6) AS SAMPLE6 , SUM(A.SAMPLE7) AS SAMPLE7 , SUM(A.SAMPLE1)+SUM(A.SAMPLE2)+SUM(A.SAMPLE3)+SUM(A.SAMPLE4)+SUM(A.SAMPLE5)+SUM(A.SAMPLE6)+SUM(A.SAMPLE7) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT REPLACE(SUBSTR(RQST_DT,1,7),'.','-') AS RQST_DT , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0001' /* 생체검사 - PCR - PBFD*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE1 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0002' /* 생체검사 - PCR - APV*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE2 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0003' /* 생체검사 - PCR - PDD*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE3 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0010' /* 생체검사 - PCR - chlamydia*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE4 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_SECOND_CD = 'B001-02-16' /* 생체검사 - 성감별PCR */ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE5 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_SECOND_CD = 'B001-02-11' /* 생체검사 - 분변검사 */ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE6 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO ) , 0) AS SAMPLE7 FROM TB_RCEPT A WHERE 1=1 AND RQST_DT LIKE CONCAT(#{stDt},'%') ) A GROUP BY RQST_DT UNION SELECT '2022-01', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-02', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-03', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-04', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-05', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '2022-06', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 FROM DUAL ) B ORDER BY B.RQST_DT

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.RQST_DT , SUM(A.SAMPLE1) AS SAMPLE1 , SUM(A.SAMPLE2) AS SAMPLE2 , SUM(A.SAMPLE3) AS SAMPLE3 , SUM(A.SAMPLE4) AS SAMPLE4 , SUM(A.SAMPLE5) AS SAMPLE5 , SUM(A.SAMPLE6) AS SAMPLE6 , SUM(A.SAMPLE7) AS SAMPLE7 , SUM(A.SAMPLE1)+SUM(A.SAMPLE2)+SUM(A.SAMPLE3)+SUM(A.SAMPLE4)+SUM(A.SAMPLE5)+SUM(A.SAMPLE6)+SUM(A.SAMPLE7) AS TOTAL FROM ( SELECT RQST_DT , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0001' /* 생체검사 - PCR - PBFD*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE1 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0002' /* 생체검사 - PCR - APV*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE2 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0003' /* 생체검사 - PCR - PDD*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE3 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_THIRD_CD = 'B001-02-01-0010' /* 생체검사 - PCR - chlamydia*/ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE4 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_SECOND_CD = 'B001-02-16' /* 생체검사 - 성감별PCR */ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE5 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND INSP_SECOND_CD = 'B001-02-11' /* 생체검사 - 분변검사 */ ) , 0) AS SAMPLE6 , IFNULL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO ) , 0) AS SAMPLE7 FROM TB_RCEPT A WHERE 1=1 AND RQST_DT LIKE CONCAT(#{stDt},'%') ) A GROUP BY A.RQST_DT ) B ORDER BY B.RQST_DT
